data.descriptor: Outcome of meeting of Committee of Creditors
data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Outcome of meeting of Committee of Creditors
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) and in accordance with sub-clause 16(g) of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the Listing Regulations We hereby inform you that the 5th Meeting of the Committee of Creditors (CoC) originally scheduled to be held on Wednesday January 07 2026 at 4:30 P.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing was rescheduled and duly held on Thursday January 08 2026 at 11:30 A.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing.

data.descriptor: Intimation of meeting of Committee of Creditors
data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Intimation of meeting of Committee of Creditors
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) and in accordance with the requirements of sub- clause 16(g) of Clause A of Part A of Schedule III of Listing Regulations we wish to inform you that the 05th (Fifth) Meeting of the Committee of Creditors (CoC) of the Corporate Debtor was scheduled to be held on Wednesday January 07 2026 at 4:30 P.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing. We wish to inform you that the aforesaid Meeting of the Committee of Creditors (CoC) has been rescheduled and will now be held on Thursday January 08 2026 At 11:30 a.m.

data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Updates - Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process  (CIRP)
data.news_body: Response to Clarification sought by stock exchange Dated December 09 2025 Regarding Central Bureau of Investigation Case in the matter Reliance Home Finance Limited (In CIRP)

data.caption: Clarification sought from Reliance Home Finance Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Reliance Home Finance Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://www.freepressjournal.in dated December 09 2025 (Link: https://www.freepressjournal.in/mumbai/cbi-registers-case-against-anil-ambanis-son-jai-anmol-reliance-home-finance-in-rs-228-crore-bank-fraud-case) titled "Anil Ambanis Son Jai Anmol & Reliance Home Finance Booked by CBI In Rs 228 Crore Bank Fraud Case".

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-List of Creditors
data.news_body:
We inform you that pursuant to Section 13(2)(c) of IBBI (Insolvency Resolution Process for Corporate Persons) Regulations 2016 the list of creditors is to be uploaded on the website of the Company. However the undersigned is unable to proceed with the same as website is not maintained by the company. The list of creditors is attached herewith. 

Meanwhile the above disclosure is being made pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 read with Clause (16)(e) of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Clarification
data.news_body: The Exchange has been seeking clarification from Reliance Home Finance Ltd with respect to the appointment of M/s Rajvanshi & Associates Chartered Accountants as Forensic Accountant and Investigator vide SEBIs letter dated August 22 2025. Even after various reminders the response from the Company is still awaited.

data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Public Announcement
data.news_body: Public announcement made pursuant to order passed by the Tribunal under Section 13 of Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code against Reliance Home Finance Limited (In CIRP)

data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Appointment of Interim Resolution Professional (IRP)
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that an application under Section 7 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016 was filed by Invent Assets Securitisation & Reconstruction Private Limited (Financial Creditor) against Reliance Home Finance Limited ("Corporate Debtor"/"Company") before the Honble National Company Law Tribunal Mumbai Bench Court VI. The Honble NCLT by virtue of the order dated September 16 2025 ("Order") in C.P. (IB)/342(MB)2025 admitted the Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process ("CIRP") for the Corporate Debtor as per the provisions of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016.

By the said Order dated 16th September 2025 Mr. Umesh Balaram Sonkar (IBBI Reg. No. IBBI/IPA-001/IP-P-02619/2021-2022/14043) has been appointed as an Interim Resolution Professional ("IRP") under the provisions of the IBC 2016.

data.caption: Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)-Admission of application by Tribunal
data.news_body: This is to inform you that an application under Section 7 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016 was filed by Invent Assets Securitisation & Reconstruction Private Limited (Financial Creditor) against Reliance Home Finance Limited ("Corporate Debtor"/"Company") before the Honble National Company Law Tribunal Mumbai Bench Court VI. The Honble NCLT by virtue of the order dated September 16 2025 ("Order") in C.P. (IB)/342(MB)2025 admitted the Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process ("CIRP") for the Corporate Debtor as per the provisions of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016.

data.news_body: Copy of Advertisement of Standalone Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended on March 31 2025

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On March 31 2025
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated May 19 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith the Audited Integrated Financial Results for the quarter and Year ended on March 31 2025 along with Independent Auditors Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on May 22 2025. The meeting of the Board commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 06:40 P.M

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On March 31 2025
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated May 19 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith the Audited Integrated Financial Results for the quarter and Year ended on March 31 2025 along with Independent Auditors Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on May 22 2025. The meeting of the Board commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 06:40 P.M

data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated May 19 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith the Audited Integrated Financial Results for the quarter and Year ended on March 31 2025 along with Independent Auditors Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on May 22 2025. The meeting of the Board commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 06:40 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting
data.news_body: Reliance Home Finance Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 22/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31 2025.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated November 11 2024 we wish to inform that Invent Assets Securitisation & Reconstruction Private Limited a financial creditor has filed a Petition under Section 7 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016 against the Company before the Honble National Company Law Tribunal Mumbai bench for a claim amount of INR 78098017/- (including interest).

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Reliance Home Finance Ltd Has Informed BSE That The Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Of The Company Is Scheduled On 08/01/2025 Inter Alia To Consider And Approve To Consi
data.news_body: Reliance Home Finance Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 08/01/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with the Uniform Listing Agreement entered into by the Company with the Stock Exchanges we wish to inform that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday January 08 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve Companys Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2024.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reliance Home Finance Limited - Code of Conduct to Regulate Monitor and Report trading in Securities and fair disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed for the Designated Persons from January 01 2025 till 48 hours after the financial results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2024 become generally available information.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyReliance Home Finance Ltd
2CIN NO.L67190MH2008PLC183216
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December, as applicable (in Rs cr) 86.71
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY D
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)CARE RATINGS LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid, in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26, 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Krutika Gada
Designation: Company Secretary Compliance Officer
EmailId: Krutika.Gada@relianceada.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Shanil Jain
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: Shnil.K.Jain@relianceada.com

Date: 30/04/2024

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular, beginning F.Y 2022, in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities, a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore, an entity identified as LC shall provide, in its initial disclosure for a financial year, the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Results - Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023
data.news_body:
Further, to our letter dated July 20, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attached herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 alongwith Independent Auditors' Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on July 28, 2023. The meeting of the Board commenced at 4:30 p.m. and concluded at 7:20 p.m.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated May 23, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and ExchangeBoard of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewiththe Audited Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023 alongwithIndependent Auditors' Report and Statement on Impact of Audit Qualifications.The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at itsmeeting held on May 27, 2023.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated January 25, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attached herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022 alongwith Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on February 2, 2023. The meeting of the Board commenced at 5:00 p.m. and concluded at 7:45 p.m.

data.caption: Half - Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions September 2022
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated November 3, 2022, we attach herewith details of Related Party Transactions, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards for the half-year ended September 30, 2022 in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as Annexure A.The details have also been submitted as part of the financial results of the Company for the quarter and                          half-year ended September 30, 2022.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter And Half-Year Ended September 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated October 26, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2022 alongwith Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on November 3, 2022. The meeting of the Board commenced at 3:20 p.m. and concluded at 6:05 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Further, to our letter dated July 27, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 alongwith Independent Auditors'' Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at their meeting held on August 4, 2022. The meeting of the Board commenced at 5:00 p.m. and concluded at 7:20 p.m.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Further, to our letter dated April 28, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022 alongwith Independent Auditors' Report.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at their meeting held on May 6, 2022. The meeting of the Board commenced at 1:00 p.m. and concluded at 5:10 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Further, to our letter dated January 17, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021 alongwith Independent Auditors' Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at their meeting held on January 24, 2022. The meeting of the Board commenced at 4:00 p.m. and concluded at 6:15 p.m.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Quarter And Half-Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated November 5, 2021 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2021 alongwith Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on November 11, 2021. The meeting of the Board commenced at 4:00 p.m. and concluded at 6:15 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated July 24, 2021 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board
of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the
Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 alongwith Limited Review Report submitted
by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its
meeting held on July 31, 2021. The meeting of the Board commenced at 4:00 p.m. and concluded at
5:45 p.m.
